name: Smart University in the IoT
tagline: Bachelor Project @ iNET RG, HAW Hamburg
body:
### About

SmartUniversity is a practical course for bachelor students of computer science and electrical engineering at the Hamburg University of Applied Sciences [HAW](www.haw-hamburg.de). 

SmartUniversity is scheduled for the winter semester 2015/16 and is organized by the [iNET](http://inet.cpt.haw-hamburg.de) research group. In the following you find further information on the designated schedule and the student projects themselves. Even more details can be found on GitHub: @smartuni.

----

### Timeline and Milestones

**23.09.15 - Kick Off**

- Introduction
- Project proposals
- Tools and workflow


**09.10.15 - Milestone 1**

- initial project specification
- designated development timeline


**06.11.15 - Milestone 2**

- first mock-up demonstration
- presentation at _Night of Sciences_ on Nov. 7th


**11.12.15 - Milestone 3**

- Release Candidate (RC1)
- Full working demonstration
- Review of code and documentation


**15.01.16 - Milestone 4**

- Final project presentations


----

### Projects and Groups

_Coming soon ..._

We will add details on the students projects after their initial presentation and specification on October 9th, 2015.

----

### Help and Examples

[examples](https://github.com/smartuni/examples)

----

### Contact

Still questions? 

Feel free to contact us see [here](http://inet.cpt.haw-hamburg.de/members).
